item.title: Maria Limao - Porto, PT
item.description: Name Maria Limao Date 27 Aug 2023 Location Porto, Portugal ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹ (Google Maps) Price â‚¬12.50 ($13.56) / two persons Notes A very charming brunch restaurant, located almost in the city center. Very clean and pleasant, with an inner courtyard. Most likely, I will come back here again.

item.title: Ramen Bambu - Porto, PT
item.description: Name Ramen Bambu Date 27 Aug 2023 Location Porto, Portugal ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹ (Google Maps) Price â‚¬23 ($24.95) / two persons Notes I liked that you can choose the level of spiciness for the ramen. There was no chicken ramen available, so I had to go with beef. Most likely, I won’t be getting ramen here again, because I usually prefer chicken.
